about.content:
This project is a web application developed in React that consumes data from the OMDb API to display information about movies.

The platform features a modern and responsive interface, focusing on user experience and SEO best practices.

Users can browse movie cards, view full details of each title, and explore future features such as "Genres", "Favorites", and "Releases".

The project architecture was designed to be scalable, using componentization, dynamic routing, and integration with external APIs.
